name: nighty-night-survival
description:
MigJam Submission for the Theme of Survival.  

How to Play:

Mouse and Keyboard Required

W, A, S, D or Keyboard to move

Mouse to point your flashlight at ghost and guide the way

Follow the green arrow for your objective and Survive!

Credits:

Ghostly sound by Mig on a late stream with beer

Big Ghost Idea:

Ben!
